text: In economics a competitive advantage is something that allows someone or a company to beat their rivals. This includes: # Low cost: I have better resources. I can make things at a lower cost. I sell things at a lower price than others. # Differentiation: The product I create is different, better, or both. # Focus: The product I create is targeted to a specific person. == Related pages == * Comparative advantage Category:Economics
title: Competitive advantage
